thread.title: San Francisco 49ers vs. New York Giants: Live updates, score, game chat
thread.title_full: San Francisco 49ers vs. New York Giants: Live updates, score, game chat | OregonLive.com

author: Erik C. Anderson | The Oregonian/OregonLive
title: San Francisco 49ers vs. New York Giants: Live updates, score, game chat
text:
The San Francisco 49ers kick off Sunday evening in Week 5 of the 2015 NFL season, facing the New York Giants. Kickoff is at 5:30 p.m.
More : TV channel and how to watch this game online
Follow along as we bring you live updates and analysis from the game from kickoff through the final whistle in the comments section below. Have thoughts on how the Colts or Jets are performing? Don't hesitate to jump in on the live updates and chat with us as the game rolls along.
